channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- pagebar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- pagebar

item.title: CVE-2022-1757|2024-08-03T00:16:59.901Z -- unknown -- pagebar
item.description: The pagebar WordPress plugin before 2.70 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack. Furthermore, due to the lack of sanitisation in some of them, it could also lead to Stored XSS issues
